In SectionÂ 2 we provide basic preliminaries about graphs, convexity, parameterized complexity, graph minors, (bounded local) treewidth, and monadic second-order logic. In SectionÂ 3 we present our \NP-completeness results, and in SectionÂ 4 we provide the FPT algorithms for graphs of bounded local treewidth.
